page.title: 18SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY
page.content: Sefton Park is the Headquarters for GEC McMichael.{There main fields are {Broadcasting Studio Projects, {Television Conferencing, Satellite {Communications and Cable Television. The latest antennae,Newshawk, is small and easily transportable and will bring immediate on the spot news coverage. Cable television will produce clearer pictures and far more channels to view. It's disadvantage is that roads or pavements have to be lifted to lay the cable. Many people feel this will cause mess and needless expense. {American soap operas}such as Dallas and Dynasty were the most popular viewing in our school. With more than 4 channels we should get more American programmes.
